description:
Peterson Creek Trails has lots of different trails that can take you in many directions. The GPS route attached is one of a ride that took around 2.5hrs and involved lots of climbing/downhill.
Once there, take the time to explore the area and find new trails, then post here!
directions: I started just off Monmouth Drive, Kamloops but you can hop into Peterson anywhere. You just need to cross the creek that runs in the bottom.
title: Peterson Creek
